timeline.message:
test service for sas generation (#124)

* test service for sas generation

* Rename test-tools to tools
Merge branch 'dev' of github.com:Azure/azure-sdk-for-android into dev
Added variables template and added analyze job.

timeline.bodyText: The job template doesn't declare the parameter Artifacts
timeline.author: bsiegel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@
+parameters:
+  Artifacts: []
+  ServiceDirectory: not-specified
+  
+stages:
+  - stage: Build
+    jobs:
+    - template: ../jobs/archetype-sdk-client.yml
+      parameters:
+        ServiceDirectory: ${{parameters.ServiceDirectory}}
+        Artifacts: ${{parameters.Artifacts}}

replies.bodyText: Doesn't need to, its only used when you want to have a default set. I would agree thought that across the mono-repos that this is inconsistently applied. I've tweaked it nonetheless :)
replies.author: mitchdenny

timeline.message: Added empty artifact set to client job template.
